name: Police Prison Sniper 3D
description:
Police Prison Sniper 3D is an action packed crime games with the best first person sniper shooting, chasing jail break prisoners and catch the criminal. As a trained security police officer, your duty is to keep an eye on any suspicious activity involving fighting prisoners, jail break criminal escape and bomb alert missions.
features:
- Amazing 3D Prison Environment
- Multiple gameplay escape and first person sniper shoot missions
- Real Thrill of chasing the Escaped jail break Prisoner
- Thrill of Playing the Role of a crime control police officer
- A Complete Prison Escape Story
